website_summaries.verdict: This is a good balance board for beginners. It offers enough of a challenge without being so difficult that you fall off.
pros: Suitable for core strength training and physical therapy after an injury
cons: Users that already have good balance may not feel that this board is much of a challenge

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money.....
customer_reviews.text: Received my balance board and was immediately reminded why I needed it!! My "mid-60's" had left me with a lot less strength in my quads and calves then I had as a runner most of my life. First tries proved pretty funny! I found myself shaking, falling off and almost spinning around. But, with placing it near a counter top in the kitchen and practicing on it several times a day for a few minutes at a time, I've begun to find my balance again and feeling stronger. It's low profile gives you courage since coming off it isn't a long way to fall! I would recommend this product. The price seems very fair for the quality of the board.
customer_reviews.author: Pattycakes

customer_reviews.title: At least you don't have to blow it up like the rubber bladders with the pump
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, just be careful when you start using it. I use two chairs to just be safe when getting on it. It has a warning about not using it if over 55 or something, but I'm in my 70's and can stand on it for 8-10 minutes without holding on to anything. At least you don't have to blow it up like the rubber bladders with the pump. I wear shoes, the non-slip surface works well. And always be safe and use it near something solid, in case you start to fall.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Helps With Plantar Fasciitis Stretching
customer_reviews.text: I use this to stretch my calves several times a day. It helps a lot with plantar fasciitis. Wear shoes though, as the grip material on top will make you slide right out of your socks!
customer_reviews.author: K. Mallory

customer_reviews.title: "Core Strength"
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this board by accident believing it was the standard twister board. It's a "balance" board and I love it. It is fun and challenging. Once you learn to balance, you can feel the workout in you core/stomach, calf, thigh, love handles; plus I wear a Fitbit so I can see how many calories I'm burning and steps equivalent and it is an outstanding workout.
customer_reviews.author: Yama Cha

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality...
customer_reviews.text: I got this so I could do my physical therapy at home. It is very sturdy and the non-slip surface makes it great to use barefoot, with socks, or with shoes. The bottom is round, so it tips easily in all directions. My only issue is that it is a bit higher than I was expecting, so I can't tip it backwards all the way without losing my balance. It's a great device for balance and strengthening ankles after a sprain.
customer_reviews.author: LiteratureLady

customer_reviews.title: Good return for space occupied
customer_reviews.text: The product works as I expected - almost. The diameter of the top surface is too small for good function, as it allows only small changes in body aspect. It is a great concept and useful within it's limits. For an adult it is ABSOLUTELY ESSENTIAL TO PUT THIS ON CARPET OR YOGA MAT for stability. Once there the non-slip surface is very effective and it takes little time to adjust to the movements needed to produce exercise. I will look for a broader surface.
customer_reviews.author: KatManning

customer_reviews.title: Very nice balance board, holding up well to hours of use.
customer_reviews.text: If you have to stand in one place for work, this board adds a bit of action without moving far. It keeps me from standing on one leg, or locking my knees. I wish the diameter was a little larger for wider stance, but it was correctly described and works fine. The no-stick grip on the top surface covers edge-to-edge and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Tech TangoTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, really helps stability and balance...
customer_reviews.text: My balance has become pretty poor and I was having a lot of trouble with tripping and falling. I asked my doctor to change my blood pressure medicine and bought this balance board. I have used it often since I got it - even while folding laundry! It is easy to use, really helps stability and balance, and is easily moved around when needed. I am glad I purchased this balance board.
customer_reviews.author: MzLucyVP

customer_reviews.title: ... the board last night and had a lot of fun with it while watching TV
customer_reviews.text: Received the board last night and had a lot of fun with it while watching TV. I also like that it came with a large card that shows various exercises that you can do using the board. I won't be doing the one for the knees again though because, even though I put a bit of padding on the board I still ended up with indian burn-type marks on both knees when I was done.
customer_reviews.author: Whale Rider

customer_reviews.title: Plastic base slips on non-carpeted floor
customer_reviews.text: This generally works as expected but there is no rubber on the base and the plastic slips all over a floor without carpet. Makes it feel a bit TOO dangerous for a beginner (these things feel like death traps anyway; no need to make it worse). Have plans to putty the bottom of it because it's not worth the hassle of returning. **EDIT: GREAT customer service! I was issued a full refund by the company. I would definitely purchase their products again due to their great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Great for balance without the fall
customer_reviews.text: Great for balance without the fall. One thing I didn't read in reviews before buying is that you don't really fall with this balance board. The bottom is curved perfectly so the wood touches the ground. While I wouldn't recommend this for teenage boys, my three girls have enjoyed it so far. Great practice and you can even try to do tricks by spinning this while standing. :)
customer_reviews.author: Thatsthegoodstuff

customer_reviews.title: Balance board
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is a great balance board. If you're new to using one, start somewhere you can use a counter for balance. If you're experienced using a balance board I'd suggest a very hard surface, I'm currently using it in my laundry room which has a concrete floor. I've found if you use it on a carpeted surface it's too easy as it wobbles less.
customer_reviews.author: BellaSC

customer_reviews.title: It was supposed to be brand new-it was not.
customer_reviews.text: The balance board works as expected. I purchased as a new item. It was not. The box had been opened and the item was scratched. I believe I received a returned item instead of a new one. Not right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality board
customer_reviews.text: Good quality board, not as easy as it looks but helping to firm some problem areas. Also bring it to my remote office where I don't have my treadmill to keep moving while seated.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S.

customer_reviews.title: So easy and an enjoyable way to workout while you take care of house chores!
customer_reviews.text: I have this in my living room so I stand on this while I fold laundry or watch TV! The ball underneath is not as rounded as some other ones I've tried so it's a nice level of challenge and awareness of my abdominal muscles (less frustrating). I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Krazee Kat

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: I love this item because it has really helped me improve my balance and strengthen my ankles. I started doing balance exercises on the balance board, which is so hard but it helped me to figure out my center of balance. As a dancer and martial artist, I really needed this. I also found sooo many exercises on Youtube that show you how to do exercises (especially abdominal ones) with the balance board. Just make sure to put the board on a mat or rug because if you put it on a tile or wooden floor, it will spin and slide, which is pretty scary.
customer_reviews.author: Nina D

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I stand on this to help train my voice during singing lessons. Working on core strength and balance is useful for so many physical/athletic reasons as well as everyday life. I was so wobbly on this thing at first, but now it's easy to use and I can feel that it's making a difference. Don't use it on a smooth surface - carpet only! Also, I find it is easiest to use with bare feet.
customer_reviews.author: Baby Yoshi

customer_reviews.title: Would like a little more height
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty fun but it definitely isn't working my core. The build quality is OK, though the edge of the bottom of my board (only in one area) has been peeling away. It catches on the carpet since it's a little rough. I now only do this on the tile floor which is more of a challenge but still basically not a challenge at all. It's fun to try just one foot or slowly spin around in a circle.
customer_reviews.author: TheW83

customer_reviews.title: Great for my standing desk set-up at work!
customer_reviews.text: It took me a few tries to get used to it, but now I love it. I keep it at work with me and use it when I'm using my standing desk. I find it easier (and maybe safer) to use without shoes on. There's a type of gripping material in the surface that helps my feet stay on it. It's a subtle way for me to engage to core and work on leg and endless strength.
customer_reviews.author: Mutien Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great Entertainment!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great impulse buy! I already have pretty good balance, but the board was challenging enough to require some practice in order to remain in a steady position for more than a few seconds. I read previous reviews and made sure to have supports available to prevent any slipping or falling injury.
customer_reviews.author: AnneMarie

customer_reviews.title: Improve balance and core.
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed and quite a training and strengthening device. An OT came to my house and was impressed I had one. It’s helping me with balance issue and core strength.
customer_reviews.author: Shanon E.Top Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: This balance board is good for excercise and to do at home physical therapy.....there are many excercises listed on line as well as PT routines.....I am glad to have this one.
customer_reviews.author: TooBratty

customer_reviews.title: The whole family is using this to help with balance ...
customer_reviews.text: The whole family is using this to help with balance. I got it for my son who is constantly falling and getting hurt hoping it will help with his balance and control in PE at school. I think it is helping!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: I had seen it at my gym so I knew I wanted one for home use. I love it for ankle strengthening but expect to enjoy the other uses mentioned in reviews. Afraid to wear socks on it (wear out socks?) so only shoes so far. Family member is afraid I’ll scratch wood (by capturing a grain of sand maybe) floor so I use it on a rug. I’d recommend to anyone needing PT for ankles or feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kip B

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all
customer_reviews.text: We have had a lot of fun trying out this balance board! All of my family members, from the four-year-old and up enjoy it. Sometimes I’ll stand on it while watching a show just to get a little core workout. It’s not as much of a workout as I expected, but it’s certainly better than sitting on the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A.

customer_reviews.title: Very study. A little bit of movement goes a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very study. A little bit of movement goes a long way in exercising lots of muscles. I can feel it in my legs and abs.
customer_reviews.author: eeb

customer_reviews.title: Great add to our homeschool!
customer_reviews.text: We use this as part of our PE class for homeschool The kids (and parents!) love it. Helps us all to work on our core. Can also do other exercises on it such as dumbbells to increase your concentration and strength. Highly recommend! Will likely get a 2nd one for our home!
customer_reviews.author: HathiTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Really helping with sprained ankle recovery
customer_reviews.text: I am recovering from a sprained ankle and this board is really helping me to build my strength and balance back up. I am also using it for calf stretching, using it in full tilt position. Many uses. Now if I can only learn how to balance on it with my eyes closed!
customer_reviews.author: Sharostan

customer_reviews.title: Non slip on hard floor.
customer_reviews.text: We have wooden floor, possibly laminated wooden floor and works great without slipping. The grip tape on top is excellent. Bought it for my 4 year old to help with her gymnastics. It works for her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One leg is the most fun.: )
customer_reviews.text: Highly effective at improving balance. All you have to do is use it. Also, I use with bare feet and it's not problem. One leg is the most fun. :)
customer_reviews.author: ExMrMister

customer_reviews.title: I like to fidget with things and this helps me concentrate ...
customer_reviews.text: I use it at my standing desk. I like to fidget with things and this helps me concentrate a little bit. My ankles do get tired after using it for a little while
customer_reviews.author: Jern

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR CORE MUSCLES
customer_reviews.text: I KEEP IT BY THE COUNTER AT THE HOUSE AND GET ON EVERY DAY TO STRENGTHEN MY CORE MUSCLES. IT IS GETTING ME ON SHAPE SLOWLY AT MY PACE. I'VE HAD 3 IDS, SO I HAVE TERRIBLE CORE MUSCLES
customer_reviews.author: rhoda davila

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for working on balance
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something fun to challenge myself and my children to gain better balance. This is great! It's well-made and a great challenge. I anticipate having it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: DJA

customer_reviews.title: super fun to use
customer_reviews.text: This balancing board is harder to balance on then the soft half ball ones. I've been using it for about a month now, and I really like how its super challenging to use, but I keep getting better. It works perfectly on hard wood floors, and its super fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: sammy1

customer_reviews.title: Will train your balance points!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t pay enough attention to the fact it has only one balance point. Very tough for me. But no pain no gain I guess
customer_reviews.author: janrents

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with the quality of the product
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the quality of the product. The sticky tape is great and has stayed in place and nothing implies that this is cheaply built. I use it at my stand-up desk. It's a little too stable for me since it's pretty easy to settle into the balanced position, but it still allows me to change my posture a lot more as I stand and goof around with my balance.
customer_reviews.author: M Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Balance Board
customer_reviews.text: Much more solid than expected for the price. Even my physical therapist was impressed. Really helped after hip surgery. Do be sure to use it on carpeting or a mat of some kind. Lots of exercises included, with varying levels of difficulty.
customer_reviews.author: LRS

customer_reviews.title: Great ADD/ADHD fidget toy.
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son has a hard time sitting still. He actually can stand on this and play video games. Or sit on the couch and rock it back and forth with his feet. My only complaint is that it spends a lot of time sitting in the middle of my living-room, but that can't be blamed on the product. It is low enough that I can slid it under my arm chairs though. 4 stars because we don't use it for it's intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I use it 2-3 times a week, and am very pleased with the value and quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nutsman

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Sportneer balance board works well. It does look like it has been tested, which is likely part of a quality control process. Very good price. Not for beginners. Wearing sock could be dangerous as it is not easy to slide your foot off when you loose your balance; suggest that you wear shoes for your own safety. Be safe and have fun!
customer_reviews.author: Ron & Jan Finch

customer_reviews.title: Cool product - bought 2!
customer_reviews.text: Just turned one of my rooms into a gym and this is a great addition! My suggestion is to buy two and have a gym partner to throw a medicine ball back and forth while squatting on this plank. Really works the legs! Great grip too
customer_reviews.author: Jjnkx38

customer_reviews.title: Help with balance.
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Does what it's suppose to, help with balance. Guess I was expecting more. I got it & you can tell it was used. Scratched all over the bottom of it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy as expected
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy as expected. Grandkids are fighting over who gets to use it so I guess that means it was worth getting. I actually bought 2 one for 4 and 6 year old and this one for the older 3 kid. sDont know why but all prefer this to the alex brand balance board. This is a true balance board the other one for kids was more a rocking board.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Great for balance and strengthening lower legs
customer_reviews.text: Great product for improving balance! Everyone in our family has a reason to stand on this- whether to simply strengthen ankles or improve general balance. Great for athletes who participate in soccer, skating, etc. Very glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: CHmom

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic device. I bought this after going through two ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic device. I bought this after going through two Simply Fit Boards. Those things each lasted about 2 months before cracking. The Sportneer is very robust and is about half the price of the other product. I use this about two hours per day and get a very good workout. It is very difficult to balance, but that is where the workout comes in.
customer_reviews.author: Max Blue

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy quality and comes with a sheet of exercises ...
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy quality and comes with a sheet of exercises you can do with the board. As stated on the sheet -don’t use it on plain wooden or tile surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Fayelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it for the foot strengthening and balance exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Pied Piper

customer_reviews.title: No color added
customer_reviews.text: Product looks to be pink and black but actually is just wood with a slip grip sticker on it. Works well but was hoping that it was pink, I purchased for my niece
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: I’m a little nervous to use this. There seems ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m a little nervous to use this. There seems to be some weight restrictions on this I must have missed in the description of the product. Still not overly confident what the restrictions are???
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE it. I broke my ankle about 17 months ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE it. I broke my ankle about 17 months ago and I am still rehabbing my body as a consequence. I now work standing up and I keep this near my work station and I balance on it several times a day and it feels so good loosening up that ankle. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Lipkin

customer_reviews.title: Great balance tool!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. I intended to use it. I did a couple times. It’s amazing if the bottom of your foot itches too!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie D.

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but not very challenging
customer_reviews.text: I like it, just not as challenging as the one I use at the gym. Probably needs to be a little wider.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Deutsch

customer_reviews.title: Simple machine, worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Its sturdy, and works very, very well. Works out unique muscles as well as leg and butt, in hardly no time at all. 10 mins you'll feel it later. In a nice way, that is. Very useful!
customer_reviews.author: GMWoo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have weak ankles and my doctor recommended. It works especially when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Great for working on your balance, and strengthening legs and ankles.
customer_reviews.author: LJP

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this disc! I was looking for a new addition home workout regimen and this is perfect. I even use it while I'm on the phone. It's definitely not a hardcore workout, but it's a nice low impact add on. ((try doing squats while balancing!!!))
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for my rehabilitation on torn ligaments in my foot
customer_reviews.text: VERY effective with balance and twisting! Good for my rehabilitation on torn ligaments in my foot. And great for my waist...lots of twisting! *_* Definitely not easy at first, but I'm getting better...and at 61 it's impressive to me!! *_*
customer_reviews.author: Breadqueen

customer_reviews.title: Like a rock
customer_reviews.text: Got this to work on my balance. It was difficult at first but now I do several yoga poses on it and my core and balance is rock solid
customer_reviews.author: TheKaizenOne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent balance board
customer_reviews.text: The balance board arrived quickly, it was not expensive, and it is good quality. It's made of wood with anti-skid material on the top surface. You can pick up balance board exercises online.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product for someone who wants to improve their balance
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for someone who wants to improve their balance. It has a higher base so it is not for beginners. But it is well made and wide enough to be good for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M.

customer_reviews.title: Please hold on to stable surface when you use it!
customer_reviews.text: A bit scary at first-cannot use without holding onto kitchen counter!! Like the movement and learning to "walk" it back and forth. Good stretch for waist and hip joints-hope my balance will improve.
customer_reviews.author: Aretha

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid piece of equipment and really helps balance. I like to stand on this while curling dumbells.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth N.

customer_reviews.title: Fun and effective. Be careful.
customer_reviews.text: Do as it says and don’t balance on slick flooring. Fun and effective workout.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C. Neel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Solid piece. Makes a great toy, grand kids like to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: TexanForever

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems very sturdy - am just starting to use, but it appears to be as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Lene G.

customer_reviews.title: ... with my standing desk at work and am really happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my standing desk at work and am really happy with it. I like the non-slip surface and can even wear my dress shoes while using it.
customer_reviews.author: K Bennett

customer_reviews.title: for $22 how can you lose?
customer_reviews.text: for $22 how can you lose? Works as expected. Be careful. Start on a rug. Not as challenging as a larger board but very good to reclaim balance
customer_reviews.author: skidame

customer_reviews.title: nice to hop on after I've been sitting too long at computer
customer_reviews.text: This is for myself. I like using for my balance. Very simple. I love it! Just another part of my workout plans.
customer_reviews.author: bluelulu

customer_reviews.title: Good product and well
customer_reviews.text: Need to use this more often. Good product and well made
customer_reviews.author: marion saunders

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sounds like a good concept, but my kids did not use it nor any of the neighbors kids.
customer_reviews.author: HAP

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Good for balance! Could be a little dangerous on tile or hard wood, as its a bit slippery, but once I took it outside on the driveway, I felt very safe! Not only do I feel my balance getting better- I believe its also strengthening my ankles!! Glad to have purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Guests wonder what it is and want to try it out!
customer_reviews.text: Easy and fun to use. Helps strengthen core and improve balance. Just don’t use it on wood or linoleum floors.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn D

customer_reviews.title: I like this its so fun to use its maybe a ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this its so fun to use its maybe a little too easy though or maybe i just already have really good balance
customer_reviews.author: Just Another Cat Person

customer_reviews.title: fun and keeps you moving
customer_reviews.text: I use this to stand on at work, fun and keeps you moving.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: and wide enough for beginners like myself from falling off & slip resistance
customer_reviews.text: This wooden balance board is very stable, and wide enough for beginners like myself from falling off & slip resistance....previously I bought a cheaper one which was so slippery I had to send it back, much worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: freckles

customer_reviews.title: Good balance board
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Wish it was a little bigger. But solid construction
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: This is a good workout tool to improve balance
customer_reviews.text: This board is good for gaining control and strengthening the ankles and legs, just standing or doing squats or pistons. It's good prep for a half Bosu ball. There are really no downsides.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas B. Tatro

customer_reviews.title: I stand for a few hours at a time and it feels great to move around
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my standing desk at work. I stand for a few hours at a time and it feels great to move around. Made of very sturdy materials. No flexing in the wood platform.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Works great as expected
customer_reviews.text: Works great as expected! Good for all the family! If you need, you can hold on to something while you get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. N. SOUSA

customer_reviews.title: Great for balance
customer_reviews.text: Seems great. I need to challenge myself with it because it's pretty easy just to stand and balance. I guess I should move on it. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Beautiful

customer_reviews.title: Serious Balance Board
customer_reviews.text: This balance board was a great help as I recovered from Achilles tendon issues. Be careful using it though. Follow instructions regarding footwear and under the board mats.
customer_reviews.author: Myrtle12

customer_reviews.title: My special education students love this! I wish I could afford to buy ...
customer_reviews.text: My special education students love this! I wish I could afford to buy one for each of my students who need movement in their days.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Used with standing desk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my standing desk in my office. It works pretty well. Not too challenging to balance when I am holding onto or typing at the desk. When I let go, my legs activate and I can feel them working to balance. I wish it was a little wider for a different stance, but it works great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Meinzer

customer_reviews.title: I really like the board
customer_reviews.text: I really like the board, alot safer than the one that is popular right now. Is there a special mat to keep it from moving? I hang onto the kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Physical therapy exercises at home
customer_reviews.text: I got this board to use at home for rehab. I used a much larger board in physical therapy, but this board is suitable.
customer_reviews.author: Bonifacio

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Simple, quality balance board. I use this to build ankle stability after multiple sprains.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: So Much Fun
customer_reviews.text: This has been a fun and active item for my kids. It is helping with their core and balance. The adults love it too in my family.My 3 year old is in love with this toy. Not only is he gaining better balancing skills which have helped him in soccer, but he is also having a blast doing it. He doesn't even know he is gaining skills.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Sidhu

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Its durable, cheap, I use it for leg day. Im 210 lbs and its not breaking
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! And what a GREAT price for such ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! And what a GREAT price for such a quality item! I am in rehab, post knee surgery. I brought it to my PT. and she loved it too!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Millbern

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your bucks!
customer_reviews.text: Met expectations and more, everyone in the household loved it!
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Good exercise investment
customer_reviews.text: Great exercise piece. My 3 year old has picked up balancing on this really easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kofi Ewusi

customer_reviews.title: Very solid construction
customer_reviews.text: Very solid construction. Good for building core strength and balance.
customer_reviews.author: JPS

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me entertained and busy instead of getting into all kinds of bad postures when I'm zoning out into my work
customer_reviews.text: I used this at my stand up desk at the office instead of sitting around all day. Keeps me entertained and busy instead of getting into all kinds of bad postures when I'm zoning out into my work.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanna Torloni

customer_reviews.title: They had something like this at Physical therapy and thought I could benefit ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for therapy from workplace accident. They had something like this at Physical therapy and thought I could benefit from owning one. It has definitely helped loosen my ankle from damage done from compartment syndrome.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ott

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for over 6 hours per day for about 3 weeks now. I feel the benefits. The 'sand paper' covering really helps keep your feet in place and rely on your body movement to keep your balance. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: ON ON

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my Sportneer balance board! I'd highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Ellis

customer_reviews.title: a real workout.. tough for an "old fart" ...
customer_reviews.text: a real workout..tough for an "old fart" to balance on this !
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi Maddux

customer_reviews.title: Very challenging balance board
customer_reviews.text: Very challenging — great for improving balance and strengthening core muscles. Only issue is that the bottom is too slippery, and it skitters around, even on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: NY Mom

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: trying to get the hang of it, harder than I thought it would be!!
customer_reviews.author: Paulette M. Gwartney

customer_reviews.title: Way fun. Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love this --Totally fun and awesome. Really good for you too. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: pepper

product_meta.title: Sportneer Balance Board, Wooden Wobble Boards for Exercise, Gym, Stability Training, Physical Therapy, Rehab, 15.7'' Diameter, Black
product_meta.description:
Sportneer's 360 Rotation Wooden Balance Board is the perfect addition to your fitness routine to help improve core strength, strengthen targeted muscles, and enhance coordination. This balance board is a great indoor or at home workout. See improvements in your sport performance, balance and rehabilitation to get you back on track from past injuries. It's made with a heavy duty wood plate and a non-slip surface to enhance balance and stability. Great for Athletes, gymnasts, ballerinas, snowboarders, skiers, surfers, skateboarders, and etc.

Specifications:
-Material: Wood + Plastic
-Weight: 1.7 lbs
-Package Size: 16.1 x 15.7 x 3.5inch /41 x 40 x 9cm

Package Includes:
-1 x Wooden Balance Board
-1 x User Manual
-1 x Warranty Card

Important Notes:
1. Not for beginners;
2. Age Range: 12-55;
3. Do not use this product on a ultra-smooth surface, for example, tile floor;
4. To ensure safety, before you feel comfortable using this balance board, please hold something to support your body, such as the wall, a chair or somebody.

Seller Warranty
-12-Month Replacement Warranty
-30-Day Money Back Guarantee
-Lifetime Support Guarantee
feature_bullets: ★ DURABLE WITH NO-SKID SURFACE: Made with heavy duty durable and high quality wood. Wooden plated board with no-skid surface to ensure good balance, grip and stability
★ 360 DEGREE ROTATION: 360 degrees rotation and 10-20 degrees inclination angle
★ IMPROVES CORE STRENGTH & POSTURE: Improves core strength, posture, enhances coordination, sense of balance and visual sense
★ TARGETS MUSCLES: Helps to strengthen the targeted muscles, ligaments, tendons and joints
★ GREAT FOR TRAINING: Great for rehabilitation centers, gyms, professional athletes and individual
